description: Represents a request to create a digest report.

recipients.description: The list of recipients to send the report to. If empty, the list from orgsettings will be used.
recipients.title: recipients

save.description: If enabled, save the report into database. Note that this will make the report being considered the last auto generated report, and all the next one trends will be calculated from this one. This is mostly never what you want to do.
save.title: save

timeWindow.description: The time window for the report. The report will span from `[now() - tw, now()]`. 24h is the minimum.
timeWindow.title: timeWindow

title: DigestReportRequest
